definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: Littleness and glory are the choices open to your striving and your vigilance.
sentences.chinese: 你究竟願爲卑微或爲榮耀而警醒奮鬥，完全操之於你。

sentences.english: The most lowly people of society became dignified beings in Millet's paintings.
sentences.chinese: 社會中最卑微的人，卻成爲米勒畫中有尊嚴的生命。

sentences.english: He is very sensitive about his humble origin.
sentences.chinese: 他對自己卑微的出身很敏感。

sentences.english: If there is next life, darling, I may be only for the humble round of the beast.
sentences.chinese: 假如有來生，親愛的，我也許只能輪爲卑微的畜生。

sentences.english: My dear devotees, Please accept my humble obeisances.
sentences.chinese: 我親愛的奉獻者們，請接受我卑微的頂拜。

sentences.english: Our Humble Soul shows Xiong Zhengliang's narrative features in his novels.
sentences.chinese: 《我們卑微的靈魂》顯示了熊正良的小說敘事特徵。

sentences.english: You must forgive me my unworthiness.
sentences.chinese: 我的卑微需要你來原諒。

sentences.english: There is an abasement because of glory: and there is one that shall lift up his head from a low estate.
sentences.chinese: 有的屈辱來自尊榮，但也有人從卑微中擡起了頭。

sentences.english: From humble forest dwellers we were forced to become brutal soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 我們從卑微的森林居民，被迫變成殘忍的士兵。

sentences.english: World had to be in travail, that the meanest flower might blow.
sentences.chinese: 社會必須經歷陣痛以便讓最卑微的花開放。

sentences.english: Lk. 1:52 He has brought down potentates from thrones and has exalted the humble;
sentences.chinese: 路一52他叫有權柄的失位，叫卑微的升高。

sentences.english: For while Jesus was lowly, he wasso with regards to the teachable.
sentences.chinese: 因爲耶穌雖然卑微，但他是對那些可教的才這樣。

sentences.english: Rule No.11: Be nice to nerds. You may end up working for them.
sentences.chinese: 善待卑微的人，你可終其一生都在爲其工作。

sentences.english: Their lives seemed to me so petty, so slavish.
sentences.chinese: 他們的生活在我看來是那樣卑微，那麼俗氣。

sentences.english: Just for a laugh, and have a crush on the low memory.
sentences.chinese: 只爲一個笑，而迷戀於那卑微的回憶裏不可自拔。

definition: to bow and bend the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
